login.selectserver.message:
Select the server you want to use, or manually input a base URL and API key.
To use a custom URL or client ID, input your choices then select Custom.

login.authorizing.message: Login to the app, and press OK when you're done.

error.emptycontent.error: There's nothing here. Try again later.
error.permissiondenied.generic: You don't have permission to do this.
error.permissiondenied.specific: You do not have permission in @name to @perm.
